settings.title: Maximum Copper Advantage
settings.text: We infuse copper directly into the nylon fibers of our high-performance fabric. Then we apply a long-lasting coating of additional copper. This innovative approach provides maximum benefits, extending the life of the product and fighting the source of odor for a superior experience.

settings.title: Copper Infused
settings.text: We infuse copper into the fibers, and apply additional copper protection to the finished fabric.

settings.title: Compression
settings.text: Adds stability & support to your body part when engaging in various activities.

settings.title: Antimicrobial
settings.text: Antimicrobial properties provide maximum benefits, extending the life of the product for a superior experience

settings.title: Moisture Wicking
settings.text: Material wicks sweat & dries really fast. Adds stability to your body part when engaging in various activities

settings.title: Flexible Fabric
settings.text: 4-way stretch construction moves better in every direction

settings.title: Anti Odor
settings.text: Our copper infused fabric helps keep bad odors away

settings.title: Strength to Heal
settings.content:
Feel the difference

Functionality is one of the defining principles behind every Copper Compression product. Our diverse offering not only provides support and protection, but allows you to move on with life.

settings.title: Are compression garments effective for the recovery of exercise-induced muscle damage?
settings.content: “… Analyses of power… and strength… indicate faster recovery of muscle function after exercise.”

settings.title: Compression recovery effects on exercise-induced muscle damage in young, active females.
settings.content: “… The results indicate that compression clothing is an effective recovery strategy following exercise-induced muscle damage.”

settings.title: Effects of compression clothing on performance and recovery
settings.content: “When compression clothing was applied for recovery purposes after exercise, small to moderate effect sizes were observed in recovery of maximal strength and power, and reductions in muscle swelling and perceived muscle pain; blood lactate removal; and increases in body temperature.”

settings.title: Metallic Copper as an Antimicrobial Surface
settings.content: “Bacteria, yeasts, and viruses are rapidly killed on metallic copper surfaces, and the term “contact killing” has been coined for this process.”

settings.title: Four Studies
settings.subtitle: Related studies from The National Institute of Health
